title: Aluminum AW 5754
text: Corten Steel S355J2W, also known as weathering steel, develops a natural patina layer that protects its surface and gives it a striking rustic appearance. This protective layer evolves over time, providing the material with superior corrosion resistance, even under adverse atmospheric conditions. Ideal for exterior applications, Corten combines structural robustness with a unique aesthetic, integrating harmoniously into urban and architectural projects. Additionally, its reduced maintenance makes it a sustainable choice, combining design and functionality in an exemplary way. It's the perfect option for those looking to create environments with character and proven durability.
